meanings.sent1: I need to reselect a new book from the library.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reselect her outfit for the party.
meanings.sent3: After accidentally choosing the wrong color, she had to reselect her paint.
meanings.sent4: He had to reselect his path in life after facing a major setback.
meanings.sent5: The customer took a long time to reselect the perfect gift for his friend.

meanings.sent1: Please reselect your preferred seat for the flight.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the student to reselect a different topic for the essay.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to reselect the ingredients for the recipe after realizing he was out of stock.
meanings.sent4: She had to reselect her words carefully before speaking in front of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The team captain had to reselect the starting lineup due to unexpected injuries.
